name: Your Time's (Not) Up
description:
“Be the Guardian Angel and save people with Rhythm!”

Your Time's Not Up is a 3D Rhythm Game where you play as Guardian Angel saving patients using the power of Music! 

This game was made as part of the Intro to Rapid Game Development course at the Centre for Entertainment Arts.

How to Play AKA How to Save A Life:

1. Grab the heart beats as soon as they come close to the buttons. Don't miss them! 2. Avoid the death notes, they will reduce your life! 

Pay attention to the timer *tick tock - tick tock*

Team

Game Programmer: Harsh Manish Koranne

Lead Artist: Sida Kong

Project Manager: Madhur Arora
